mapper.insert: insert into addrbook(ab_name, ab_email, ab_comdept, ab_birth, ab_tel, ab_memo) values(#{abName}, #{abEmail}, #{abComdept}, #{abBirth}, #{abTel}, #{abMemo})
mapper.select: select AB_ID abId ,AB_NAME abName ,ab_email abEmail ,ab_comdept abComdept ,ab_birth abBirth ,ab_tel abTel ,ab_memo abMemo from addrbook where ab_id = #{abId}
